## Description {#details}

This file a TargetTransformInfo::Concept conforming object specific to the AArch64 target machine.

It uses the target&#39;s detailed information to provide more precise answers to certain TTI queries, while letting the target independent and default TTI implementations handle the rest.

<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NOTE: The logic below is mostly geared towards LV, which calls it with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       vectors with 2 elements. We might want to improve that, if other</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       users show up.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Nontemporal vector loads/stores can be directly lowered to LDNP/STNP, if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the vector can be halved so that each half fits into a register. That&#39;s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the case if the element type fits into a register and the number of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// elements is a power of 2 &gt; 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;DataTypeTy = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;FixedVectorType&gt;</a>(DataType)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumElements &gt; 1 &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a434f6a0d80fb13e4326e848a6391f057">isPowerOf2&#95;64</a>(NumElements) &amp;&amp; EltSize &gt;= 8 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
